summary: A charismatic ronin gets snared into a conflict between officials at a waystation, and gains the enmity of a group of thugs.
cast: Isao Natsuyagi|Ryôhei Uchida|Junko Miyazono|Tatsuo Endô|Junkichi Orimoto|Yoshirô Aoki|Takashi Tabata|Kyôichi Satô|Misako Tominaga|Toyoko Takechi|Yuki Aresa|Ayako Satô|Rumiko Fuji|Akira Shioji|Daisuke Awaji|Hajime Miyazawa|Ryôji Katsuki|Akira Hirasawa|Ryô Nishida|Hachirô Minamoto|Takeshi Kumagai|Hajime Nagoya|Gentarô Mori|Shintarô Nasu|Yukio Miyagi|Yasushi Ôki|Kenji Ikeda|Toshio Kitagawa|Tensaku Murata|Toshio Sugawara|Jôki Takashi|Seiji Môri|Kuniomi Kitani|Sen Okaji|Takaya Shimoyama|Masaru Shiga|Tatsunori Koga|Shunji Sasaki
title: Kiba Ôkaminosuke
